descriptionHtml:
[I][SIZE=6][FONT=Palatino Linotype][COLOR=#953734][B]Adriana Calcelmo[/B][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I]
[SIZE=3] [FONT=Palatino Linotype]Adriana is my first standalone follower that i have made for the nexus but i have some personal experience with making them. Please message me or leave a comment if you run into any problems.[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][COLOR=#953734]---Summary---[/COLOR][/B]
You will run into Adriana in Solitude in Radiant Raiment shopping for something good to ware other than her hunting clothes. She may look at you, so be prepared to talk, (because she low key thirsty AF) she is looking for a partner to hunt with and share a home with so put on yo chain of Mara and start chopin.[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype]

[IMG]http://onlinehtmltools.com/bbcode-html-convertor/upload/2k183533f16a.jpg[/IMG]
[/FONT][/SIZE][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype]
[/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][COLOR=#953734][FONT=Georgia][B]---Install---[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype]-You can Install using most mod mangers
-If your mod manager doesn't work, take the Esp and other folders out of the Data folder and move them to your Skyrim data folder[/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][COLOR=#953734][FONT=Georgia][B]---Uninstall---[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=3]-Now why would you do that?
-But for real dou, Take the folders out that you out in[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=3]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=4][COLOR=#953734][B]---Credits---[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3]-[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]4k Sg textures for body[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]
-Cbbe
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3]-[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair V 1.1.3[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3]-[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty Mod[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3][COLOR=#953734][B]---Armor/clothes used in photos---[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3]-[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]Tera Armor[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=3]-[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53697/?]Midnight Breed Armor (HIGHLY RECOMEND FOR THIS FOLLOWER)[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=3][FONT=Georgia]-S[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?]hara imperial outfit[/URL][/FONT][/SIZE]

[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]

author: JakeOberg
